name: Town Of The Dead Life 死寂之城
name_original: Town Of The Dead Life 死寂之城
description:
overview


In 《Town Of The Dead Life》, you will play one of the few survivors in the last world. You not only need to survive in difficult conditions, but also need to build your own camp, find more survivors to join you, and build strong fortifications to resist the attack of zombies. You will also meet a variety of people and things, your decision may determine your fate, maybe also affect the fate of the world!

the unknown world


  • when you recreate the game, it will be unique.
    Completely random city map and indoor exploration map, unpredictable time of the zombie attack, NPC. Every game you play will be a new adventure.
  • unpredictable survivor events.
    Join your survivors, they may get sick, make trouble, etc., and how to deal with them will determine whether they will help or burden you.

various ways to play


  • 《Town Of The Dead Life》is full of all kinds of elements.
  • your goal is not only to keep yourself alive, but also to expand your camp: build, expand, produce, manufacture, etc.
  • as a leader, you also need to assign tasks to the survivors of your camp: resource production, cleaning up camp garbage, searching for discovery points, exploring supplies, researching defense towers, etc.
  • you can use a variety of weapons to fight in the game, and assemble a variety of accessories for them to assemble your own weapons.

  • each has its own defense equipment. A large number of traps and defense towers are arranged around the camp, which can effectively help you guard the camp.

completely different roles


  • you can also learn their survival skills from NPCs and unlock their unique characters.
  • there are all kinds of NPC in the world. With the in-depth communication between you and NPC, they may provide you with some help, which may be the key to affect the fate of the world.
  • when you have rich resources, you can exchange resources with them, which can help you live better.

powerful production


  • explore all kinds of resources in the world, you can make different weapons, defense equipment, medicine, food.

instant combat


  • never know what kind of enemy you are facing tomorrow.

  • in the face of different situations, maybe we should use different strategies to deal with the enemy.

more

  • there are many more to be found

last

  • there are still many deficiencies in the game. We will increase, decrease and optimize the content according to the follow-up situation. I hope you like it.
  • we are two gamers with game dreams. We entered the game industry by chance and met by fate. Went through a lot of things and saw all kinds of people. Finally decided to use our own strength to make a game that belongs to us. Regardless of the final evaluation of the game, we firmly believe that we have made the best efforts for what we think is valuable. It also marks our life. Thank you for helping us along the way, and hope that we have similar experience of friends to work hard and refuel.
